legacy.full_text: What's @EU_Commission doing with investigating Chinese #ElectricVehicles? Simply, it is the EU saying to the Europeans: "Look, you may like this Chinese car, it may have great performance, and it is not expensive, but I'm going to impose a tax on it so that you can't afford it." https://t.co/OEG59ML5nh

legacy.full_text: Why are the Western media pumping out rhetoric about #China in economic decline? Here's our interview. https://t.co/ZZ90bChhLO
